title: Note- In the case of parking spaces for motor vehicles, upto 50 per cent of the prescribed space may be of the size of 2
clause_text: Note- In the case of parking spaces for motor vehicles, upto 50 per cent of the prescribed space may be of the size of 2.3 m x 4.5 m. (iii)Marking of Parking Spaces-Parking spaces shall be paved and clearly marked for different types of vehicles.
